attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I dont exacly have alot of money and i recently made a good friend in vancouver and i would like to go and vist him. However, i cant afford to as flights alone cost upwards of £500. I think getting me to vancouver would  improve relations with canada, or at leat a few canadians. which is a start.
Anyway, why should rich people have all the fun? Im only 15 and dont have time for a full time job, what with highers and all...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
